CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Administrative proceedings;Article 6-1 - Reasonable time)
JUDGES: Egidijus Kūris;Vincent A. De Gaetano;Gabriele Kucsko-Stadlmayer
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE . He is a former lawyer who was admitted to the bar in DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant renounced his right to practise as a lawyer because he had , as a result of his gambling addiction , committed criminal offences . On DATE the applicant was convicted of aggravated fraud and embezzlement and sentenced to CARDINAL half years’ imprisonment .
